name: 11th Edition of International Conference on Preventive Medicine and Public Health
content: Theme: Emphasize on recent advancements in Preventive Medicine and Public Health to deliberate the outcomes It takes pleasure in inviting the scientific community across the globe to attend the 11th Edition of International Conference on Preventive Medicine and Public Health during June 22-23, 2020 at Zurich, Switzerland with a motto to Explore Innovations in Preventive Medicine and Public Health. The gathering will address sustainable developments in the area of Prevention, Medicine, while laying emphasis on innovative methodologies in Public Health. Preventive Medicine Conference 2020 will be the best venue for academicians, researchers and interested parties to discuss proposals and advancements in their research field. Preventive Medicine Conference 2020 will encourage Young Researcher’s Forum, scientists and the researchers in their early stage of career graph to widely discuss their outcome so as to enrich and develop the idea. The ‘Best Poster Award’ is meant to encourage students in taking active part in the International Science platform to sharpen their skills and knowledgebase. Preventive Medicine Conference 2020 is comprised of 23 tracks and 84 sessions designed to offer comprehensive sessions that address current issue. For more scientific sessions and abstract submission, please visit: https://preventivemedicine.euroscicon.com/call-for-abstracts Grab the opportunity to participate by registering through flowing link: https://preventivemedicine.euroscicon.com/registration For further details, please contact: Olivia John Conference Manager | Preventive Medicine Conference 2020 Direct: +44-2033182512 40 Bloomsbury Way Lower Ground Floor London, United Kingdom WC1A 2SE WhatsApp: +441995310010 E-mail: preventivemedicineconf2020@gmail.com
